faqs.question: Who is CEO
faqs.answer: Guru is the CEO of Smartters Software, leading innovation and company growth.

faqs.question: Who is CTO
faqs.answer: Ayushi is the Chief Technology Officer who manages all engineering and AI projects.

faqs.question: Who is Sahil
faqs.answer: Sahil is a MERN stack developer working on full-stack web applications and integrations.

faqs.question: Who is Vanshika
faqs.answer: Vanshika is a senior software developer managing frontend architecture and mentoring junior developers.

faqs.question: Who leads Smartters
faqs.answer: Smartters Software is led by Guru (CEO) and Ayushi (CTO).

faqs.question: What is Smartters
faqs.answer: Smartters Software is an Indian tech company specializing in AI automation, MERN development, and enterprise software.

faqs.question: What services Smartters provide
faqs.answer: Smartters offers web and mobile development, DevOps, AI automation, and software consulting.

faqs.question: Where is Smartters located
faqs.answer: Smartters Software is headquartered in India and serves clients globally.

projects.name: Hpluz
projects.description: A healthcare appointment and lab report management platform with secure authentication.

projects.name: Binimise
projects.description: A municipal management system for waste tracking, vendor reporting, and daily task updates.

projects.name: GetHiredAT
projects.description: A smart job application platform that uses AI to parse resumes and auto-fill applications.

projects.name: SmartCRM
projects.description: An internal CRM for tracking client interactions, invoices, and project health metrics.

projects.name: EduPort
projects.description: A mobile-first education portal connecting tutors and students for online learning.
